plot: After his bike goes missing, a London teenager meets with a friend and pieces together his recollections of where he last used it. This leads to a troubling situation and a confrontation ...
title: The Bike Thief
plot_es: After his bike goes missing, a London teenager meets with a friend and pieces together his recollections of where he last used it. This leads to a troubling situation and a confrontation ...
